original_title: Do You Love Me Like I Love You (Part 3: Kicking Against the Pricks)
overview: A short film to accompany the reissue of Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds album Kicking Against the Pricks (originally released in 1986). The result is a determinedly human portrait of the unique body of work produced by the band over the last 25 years, told through those who have lived and loved the music, including close collaborators.
title: Do You Love Me Like I Love You (Part 3: Kicking Against the Pricks)
